column4: just making sure... grub exsists, I'm on through ubuntu right now, what I'm lacking is the option to load windows again (everyone who answered earlier)
sorry, what is not working. You want to windows to appear as an option in grub or does grub not appear?
I added windows to the menu.lst so it appears as an option but doesn't load.
ah okay, what is the error?
I don't have the exact text but it says it can't find a kernel or operating system, I can give a quick restart and come back with the messege if that helps.
nope its fine. can you pastebin me the output of sudo fdisk -l and your /boot/grub/menu.lst please
sure.. I'll query it to you not to flood here. second.
err there are a few partitions. Which one is your windows install in sudo fdisk -l?
okay, thats all correct. Try change rootnoverify to root
I'll try that again. hope it works
hehe... if what I was missing was that [space] I'll have a good laugh about this :)
